data.name: Anandtech Article Width Changer
data.description:
Make use of the vast margin on the left and right in the window.
Adjusts the width of articles accordingly to the window size.

data.name: Kyodo news(kiji.is) article width adjuster

a岛板块屏蔽：https://greasyfork.org/scripts/397150

data.name: Visited Hyperlinks
data.description:
Default colour is set to Green, if you wanted to change your own colour , follow the instructions below :)



Install
Click on Stylish
Open installed 
Find this "Visited Hyperlinks"
Click the pencil (edit)
Change "green" to any other colour, red, purple, blue ect 
Click save at top right
